channel.title: Technical Documentation on TechDoc_process
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Documentation on TechDoc_process

item.title: Levels
item.description: 1. Initial/Preparation stage: Based on the Tech Doc request, gather all the inputs required to create the document. Identify the document type and organize the folder structure. Liase with SMEs and stakeholders to collect all available inputs. Have a Q&A session with SME to clarify any doubts. 2. Version Control System: VCS is a software designed to help team collaborate and work in parallel. Git is distributed version control software. Version control is a way to save changes over time without overwriting previous versions.
